Introduction

So Soo Bin is a South Korean singer-songwriter and producer under Peaches Label. He debuted as an artist on August 2, 2016, with his first digital single, "oh-i".

He participated in JTBC 2023/2024 survival show Sing Again 3 and finished in 2nd place.
